Metadata.title: Learning Tools and Flashcards for Language Learning | QuizerPlay
Metadata.keywords: Learning, flashcards for learning, associations, learning motivation, education gamification, learning English, English study
Metadata.description: QuizerPlay offers innovative AI-powered learning tools for effective language acquisition. Use our online flashcards, simulators, and gamified methods to accelerate your learning and stay motivated.

Landing.mainDesc: Use gaming simulators for effective memory retention.
Landing.section1Block1Text: Structure knowledge with modules and study groups.
Landing.section1Block2Text: Practice questions and answers until they're second nature.
Landing.section1Block3Text: Earn medals for progress and stay motivated.
Landing.section1Block4Text: Generate associations with AI or create your own.
Landing.section1Block5Text: Bronze for the first success, gold for full mastery.
Landing.section1Block6Text: Web app, mobile version, and browser extension
Landing.section2Block1Text: Create modules, study group, and terms. Organize materials by topics.
Landing.section2Block2Text: Choose a simulator and dive into the learning process.
Landing.section2Block3Text: Beat your own progress and earn medals for achievements!
Landing.section3Block3Text: Test your knowledge through active input.
Landing.section4Text: Simplify learning: structure your knowledge and enjoy the process of improvement.
Landing.footer: © 2024. All rights reserved. The {appName} Learning Platform.
Landing.helpSection1Title: Click the button to open the 'Collection' section, where you can create modules and add terms to them for easy management and study.

Folders.warnGridGroup1: After adding {size} terms, you will be able to create a study group, which will allow you to study the material in smaller, more manageable parts.
Folders.removeDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Folders.userHelpSection1Text: A study module is an entity that contains a list of terms, study groups, and simulators.
Folders.userHelpSection2Text: A term is an entity that contains a question, an answer, an association, and localizations. It is later used in simulators for memorization.
Folders.userHelpSection3Text: A study group always belongs to a module. It contains links to partitions. Partitions are linked to terms and simulators, allowing the material to be studied in smaller parts.
Folders.userHelpSection4Text: A simulator is a learning process. It is an entity that holds information about the current or past learning sessions.
Folders.userHelpSection5Text: Click the white button located at the bottom of the screen.
Folders.userHelpSection6Text: Click the ⋮ icon in the module and select "Open module." After that, you will be redirected to a screen where you can add terms.
Folders.userHelpSection7Title: How to start studying a module?
Folders.userHelpSection7Text: Click the ⋮ icon in the module and select "Study module."
Folders.userHelpSection8Title: How to create a study group?
Folders.userHelpSection8Text: Click the ⋮ icon in the module and select "Generate study groups."
Folders.userHelpSection9Title: How to start studying a group?
Folders.userHelpSection9Text: Click the ⋮ icon in the group and select "Study."

Terms.userHelpSection1Text: To add a new term, click the white button located at the bottom of the screen.
Terms.userHelpSection2Text: To start studying, click the green button located at the bottom of the screen.
Terms.userHelpSection3Title: Why is the study button disabled?
Terms.userHelpSection3Text: If the button is unavailable, it may mean that there are no terms to study or that the values of the created terms are incorrect for studying.
Terms.removeDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete this term?

Simulators.userHelpSection1Text: It is a simulator that offers 4 answer choices, and you need to select the correct one.
Simulators.userHelpSection2Text: It is a version of the Pick simulator, but with the questions and answers swapped. You need to select the correct question for the given answer.
Simulators.userHelpSection3Text: It is a two-sided card that can be flipped to view the answer. You can click the 'Learned' or 'Continue' button. All terms marked as 'Continue' will be returned to the learning cycle. This process will repeat until all terms are learned.
Simulators.userHelpSection4Text: It is a version of Flashcard, but with the questions and answers swapped. You need to guess the correct question based on the provided answer.
Simulators.userHelpSection5Text: It is a card that shows a question and provides an input field for the answer. All terms with errors will be returned to a new learning cycle. This process will repeat until all terms are entered correctly.
Simulators.userHelpSection6Text: It is a version of Input, but with the questions and answers swapped. You need to correctly write the question based on the provided answer.
Simulators.removeDialogText: Are you sure you want to stop?

Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.section1Text: At {appName}, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our platform.
Policy.section2Text: By using {appName}, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
Policy.section3Text: We collect various data to enhance your experience:
Policy.section3Item1: Authentication data: email, Google account data (for logging in via Google).
Policy.section3Item2: User activity data: clicks, mouse movements, page scrolling, keystrokes, interaction with content.
Policy.section3Item3: Website content: text with which you interact.
Policy.section4Item3: Improving your interaction with the platform.
Policy.section5Item1: Google Authentication for logging in via Google.
Policy.section5Item2: Cookies to remember preferences and improve functionality.
Policy.section6Text: We do not sell your data. We may share information with:
Policy.section6Item1: Services that assist us in providing our services.
Policy.section6Item2: As required by law or to protect our rights.
Policy.section7Text2: You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.
Policy.section8Text2: To do this, contact us at Email {email}.
Policy.section8Item1: Request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
Policy.section9Text: We take measures to protect your data, but no method of data storage can be guaranteed to be completely secure.
Policy.section10Text: We may update this Privacy Policy. All changes will be posted on this page.
Policy.section11Text: If you have any questions, contact us at Email: {email}
